amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Corps of Engineers Flood Damage Reduction projects in the Mississippi River Valley below Cape Girardeau, Missouri by $47 million and reduce funding for Renewable Energy Programs Construction by $127 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Corps of Engineers Flood Damage Reduction projects in the Mississippi River Valley below Cape Girardeau, Missouri by $47 million and to reduce funding for Renewable Energy Programs Construction by $127 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McAllister amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 284 (Roll no. 371).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McAllister amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 284 (Roll no. 371).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. McAllister.
